Description:
Detects enumeration of local network configuration

Author: Ömer Günal and remotephone, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: System Network Discovery - Linux
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%/etc/resolv.conf%' or (process_path like '%/firewall-cmd' or process_path like '%/ufw' or process_path like '%/iptables' or process_path like '%/netstat' or process_path like '%/ss' or process_path like '%/ip' or process_path like '%/ifconfig' or process_path like '%/systemd-resolve' or process_path like '%/route'))
